name: gmjam2021
description:
Team 18's Game!

==================================

Andy: Art

Marshmallows, Seven, kevindoeschemistry: dev + story

Dave: sounds

All the art, sounds and gameplay was done during the jam by our team. We borrowed assets for physics from the unity store and had an additional package for text (TextMesh PRO) that we did not make ourselves.

==================================

Theme: Return

Reverse Metroidvania:

You will be losing power as one passes through the same level. Power ideas: stun enemies when facing them, insta kill, dash etc. Fights the same boss at the end of the level, when level is complete choose a power to lose and boss gains the power, return to the start of the level again.

Lore: Cat has become all mighty and powerful, it has not returned to fight and give back its power.

Moral: Don't overwork! Take rest!

Returning to work after being in quarantine for ever and now you don’t have any social skills left, you maybe don’t like your job anymore and want to go on strike, challenge your working conditions because now you realize how much better it can be.

My teammates and I created a video game and composed a soundtrack in just 48 hours for a charity game jam! Please check out my game below and donate on behalf of my team. All proceeds go towards AbleGamers, a charity dedicated to creating communities and accessibility tools for gamers with disabilities. Be sure to include our game in your donation so my team can win the most fundraised award!

Donate: https://tinyurl.com/GMJ21Fundraiser
My Game: https://marshmallows7920.itch.io/gmjam2021
